short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful for AEM developers for easy navigation.Useful for Touch UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Cloud experience with the AEM Navigator Chrome Extension. Streamline your workflow and boost productivity by accessing essential AEM functions from a single, user-friendly popup window.

Key Features:

Simplified Workflow: Seamlessly switch between AEM modes, access consoles, and manage DAM & Sites effortlessly.
Faster Navigation: Open links in new tabs for improved organization.
Workflow Efficiency: Handle fragments, tags, configurations, distribution, security, and workflow tasks with ease.
Download now and say goodbye to tab overload. Simplify your AEM journey with AEM Navigator.

Learn More
https://howtoaem.blogspot.com/2023/09/introducing-aem-navigator-chrome.html
